mapper.select: SELECT nno,title,writer,wdate FROM( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY p.nno desc) cnt, p.nno,p.title,e.name writer,sysdate-p.wdate wdate FROM pmsnotice p, pmsemp e WHERE 1=1 and p.pno=#{pno} and p.mno=e.eno ORDER BY p.nno DESC ) WHERE cnt BETWEEN 1 AND 3

SELECT mnno,topic,writer,wdate FROM( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY p.mnno desc) cnt, p.mnno,p.topic,e.name writer,sysdate-p.wdate wdate FROM pmsmeeting p, pmsemp e WHERE 1=1 and p.pno=#{pno} and p.mno=e.eno ORDER BY p.mnno DESC ) WHERE cnt BETWEEN 1 AND 3

SELECT ino,solve,writer,wdate FROM( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY p.ino desc) cnt, p.ino,nvl2(coment,1,0) solve,e.name writer,sysdate-p.wdate wdate FROM pmsissue p, pmsemp e WHERE 1=1 and p.pno=#{pno} and p.mno=e.eno ORDER BY p.ino DESC ) WHERE cnt BETWEEN 1 AND 3

SELECT rno,ino,writer,wdate FROM( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY p.rno desc) cnt, p.rno,p.ino,e.name writer,sysdate-p.wdate wdate FROM pmsissue i, pmsemp e, pmsreply p WHERE 1=1 and i.ino=p.ino and p.mno=e.eno and i.pno=#{pno} ORDER BY p.rno DESC ) WHERE cnt BETWEEN 1 AND 3

select p.tno,p.tname,to_char(p.sdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') sdate,to_char(p.edate,'yyyy-mm-dd') edate, p.prog,to_char(p.pdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') pdate, c.cname tdiv, edate-sdate tleng, nvl2(pdate,pdate-sdate,0) dleng from pmstask p, pmscodes c where p.tdiv=c.cno and p.mno=#{eno} order by p.tno
